reviewText:
Early Access Review

Temporary Bad Review:

-Add voices in for the nazis; helps with immersion
- Tutorials are definelty a good idea
- Should add a cutscene for branding and put the reason
- Make objectives a little more clear so it doesn't feel like the player has to roam forever to find what they need to be doing
- Fix any leftover bugs
- the UI is really Text Based and cluttered, makes me feel like i'm playing a mobile statistics game. Spread it out and use some HUD and symbols to allevate it.

Otherwise a very strong work in progress
voteText: 21 of 26 people (81%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Early Access Review

This title had a great potential but unfortunately the execution was weak due to game breaking bugs, lack of directions and indications on how to proceed with game.

The game triggered random events in my playthrough such as get kick out of building while during a job or get killed by guard and game crashes for no apparent reason. This made my experience frustrating & boring. I pretty much gave up at this point due to poor & messy game design.

The game has been left to die out for months after the devs announced their promoting update.

I can't recommend this game to anyone in this poor state. I wanted to like this unique game but I can't. I will update this review when its get revised again.

Till then, #RIP Zone 22 :'(

Edit: Dev says he still working on it as he clains Not dead
date: reworking every aspect of the game." So that's good news
recommended: just waitng for him to deliver his update"
